title: (x) Who created Alphabet 26? - Bradbury Thompson {Dan Reynolds}
content:
As above really, I know the name of the typeface, but who created it...? Was it a Paul Renner creation..? I had it written down somewhere, but I’ve lost it...

I know it is mentioned in Lewis Blackwells’ 20th Century Type Remix.

Cheers

Nick

 [‹ (x) Cover of the first edition of Peter S. Beagle's "The Last Unicorn" - Kismet (Spiral) {Arun (Stephen)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410001252/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39897 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Home Edition book cover/Nike advert - ITC Grouch/Futura Cond {Florian H} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410001252/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39893 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Nickmulley

comments.content:
Check out this article, [Bradbury Thompson’s Alphabet 26: A Font System for Early Readers?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410001252/http:/www.aiga.org/content.cfm/bradbury-thompson-alphabet-26), on AIGA _Voice_.

CommArts has [an article on Bradbury Thompson](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410001252/http:/www.commarts.com/CA/feapion/brad/), too.

One more link...

[Paul Baker Typography: Alphabet 26](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410001252/http:/www.pbtweb.com/alpha26/index.html)
Thanks guys... more info than i could have hoped for...!
